column2: "In all things, all possible outcomes cannot come to pass. One must choose between two alternatives."

"A new Matter Board has been
formed. New paths have been
opened, as the future shows
signs of change."
"Your actions will determine that future. I apologize again for my ambiguous expressions."
"The only thing that I and We can say is that past and future events will become apparent."
"The Darkers are really a nuisance. Even after destroying the main body, the Darker Factor lives on and corrupts living and non-living objects."
"Ahh well, I think it really is such a pain."
"Even we are affected, if we do not neutralize the Darker Factor, it will slowly corrupt the Photons inside our bodies."
"That's why, only ARKS can fight the Darkers. You can't defeat the Darkers without having any talent in utilizing Photons. "
"Gi, Ri and I have talents utilizing these Photons, however, you are different. "
"The Dragonkin that became ferocious, absorbing the Darker Factor and cleansing it... is an impossible task for me."
"To be frank, it's a scary ability. But that power, it's one of the reasons that Xion chose you."
"Thanks to you travelling back to the past, the ferocious Dragonkin, once again, regained their sanity and an offspring between ARKS and the Dragonkin are made. "
"I don't know whatever changes to the future this might bring but it probably would be a necessary path for Xion's goal."
